ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He inquired, 'What, then, is your business, messengers?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He said: "What is then your business, O messengers?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Abraham said: “Envoys (of Allah), what is your errand?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Abraham asked, "Messengers, what is your task?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Said Ibrahim, “What is your task, O the sent angels?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (Ibrahim) said: "Then for what purpose you have come, O messengers"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: What is your affair then, O apostles!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said he, 'And what is your business, envoys?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (Abraham) said: And (afterward) what is your errand, O ye sent (from Allah)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Abraham asked, "What is your errand, O messengers?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: what then is your errand! O ye sent ones!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘O messengers, what is now your errand?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Abraham) said: "And what, O ye Messengers, is your errand (now)?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: [Ibrahim (Abraham)] said: "Then for what purpose you have come, O Messengers?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Messengers' said he (Abraham), 'what is your errand'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “What is your business, O envoys?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:31] He said, ‘So what is your business, O you who have been sent [by God]?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: ((Abraham) said: And (afterward) what is your errand) what is happening and why have you come, (0 ye sent (from Allah)?
